title: Replace function in the strings package
body:
by **rotmer**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Coming from C/Python one would expect as for me for such function to exists. There
already some implementations available for example here http://bit.ly/aMUjPZ where this
topic already was discussed. So adding new issue merely to remember and to track
progress on this, if its okay..

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
d02e9053b27d tip
